data.title: Cheap and nasty food
data.text:
Honestly this is probably one of the worst buffett i ever visit.
First they raise the price real quick and each year is more expensive.
Then the food is not great and sure is not fresh. Expecially the seafood looks everything but not fresh.
The staff is really bad, they looks mad all the time and never smile, just small talk and leave. 
Then the place is not so clean, tables and dishes many times are sticky and nasty.
I almost forget...is noise, too much and many customers talk loud, leave their child running around and makes more noise because they and their parents just don't care about other people. 
This place can be better but neet change policy.

data.title: Good service and great food
data.text: The oriental menu was a very good selection of great tasting food and no waiting for a reload. All the the staff was eager to please and very helpful

data.title: Clean and good
data.text: Always has good food prepared in a clean place. I have never been there when it was not busy. Always seated right away!

data.title: Good food selection
data.text: If you want to get your fill at a good price this is the place to do it. A good food assortment that will please everyone.

data.title: Perfect for the price you pay
data.text:
When you look at it from outside, you may not believe you'll get that good food and kind welcome 
Varieties of sea food, fruits, sides, soup and salad, ice cream
Kids also loved it there

data.title: You have a lot of choices.
data.text: It is downtown the price is great.  If you are traveling through Madera this is out of the way. The food is fair.  If you are hungry for oriental food I suggest that you stop.

data.title: waste of food
data.text: Me and my brother just eat at place.. the food tasted real old and nasty..also the price for the crap food for me and my brother was at 25.00 dollars..To much for cold food and old food..they need is to close down for good..

data.title: great value, good offerings, bad service
data.text:
THis restaurant is really great value.  You get quite some seafood for this price (the couple next to us ate a huge heap of fresh shrimp, for instance), nice salads, almost makes you wonder how they cover costs for the price.  

What is pretty bad is the service.  Already 20 minutes before closing time they ask you every minute if you want something else from the buffet, and app. 15 minutes before closing time an army appears and in seconds they disassemble the buffet, throwing away everything that remained.  But the worst is that they start cleaning around you, so with still at least 10 minutes to go from being open, you are sitting int he middle of bleach and window cleaner fumes, very very noisy cleaning work, really bad experience. When you complain and ask to finish your meal in a reasonably smelling environment, they get surprised and perhaps stop right next to you, but already 2 meters away they keep continuing, so you still sit in the middle of a huge cleaning effort that is very noisy (such as industrial vacuum cleaner) and very smelly, trying to finish your food - but at that point you do not feel hungry any more....

data.title: Waste of food
data.text: if you don't like good food this is the place to go.  They take perfectly good food and turn it into overcooked, tasteless substances.  One of the worst meals I have ever had in a restaurant

data.title: Sad
data.text: Disappointed to say the least. Steam tables not even near correct temperature. Food might have been good if it was warm. Bordering on unsafe to eat. 11/29/14 6:00 PM

data.title: Delicious!
data.text:
If your looking for a great salad bar, this is it! My husband and I were traveling back from California and needed a low sodium option and found this to be rated a 4.5 and decided to give it try. We were surprised to find it was a Chinese buffet but delighted to find it had a salad bar. Their fruit Bar was amazing too! The restrooms were very clean and the dining area was
very cool which was Wonderful since was In the 90 s. I would highly recommend this restaurant.

data.title: best value in Madera....really! at least for Chinese food
data.text:
Some of the regular Chinese buffet items plus more like poached Salmon and a salad bar I like better than Sizzler's.  Everything they serve is of good quality and fresh.  The sushi is as good as or better than most sushi bars I've been to.  A little noisey but for $6.95 all day M-F you can't beat it.  Drinks are extra for around a $1.30 I think.   Their pizza is real basic and what you'd expect at a Chinese buffet-lots of cheese and a little sauce but the kids eat it up.
Great food for  a small price.  Don't forget to tip the waitresses they work really hard as you will see if you go there.

data.title: Great Chinese Buffet w/superb Sushi for $6.99 all day! M-F
data.text:
I hate to sound like and advertisement for this restaurant but it's hard not to.  We've been eating here for the past 5 years and go often.
It has a great salad bar and the sushi is on par with the best I've ever had.  There are poached salmon, pot-stickers, fresh sushi and ginger, wasabi, peel and eat shrimp, garlic shrimp, beef and broccoli, sweet spicy orange chicken, spring rolls, fried wontons and sweet sauce, fried chicken, a desert bar, soups and much, much more including mashed potatos and gravy and a so-so pizza not bad just not on par with the quality of everything else.  Drinks are extra for a $1.30 and refills are free.   My family, extended family and many friends go there on a regular basis especially at the price of $6.99 lunch-dinner.  Ask for Michelle's section, she is a great waitress, works hard to keep tables cleared of empty dishes and refills drinks for you.  But no matter who you get as a waitress, don't forget to tip as these people work much harder in a buffet than any regular waitress at a regular restaurant.
What more can I say?  Try this place, you won't be disappointed.

data.title: comida americana
data.text: no es tanta la variedad de comida, es pura comida americana (pure, pollo frito, etc) también hay algo de comida mexicana y los postres son muy ricos. es barato algo de $13 por persona

data.title: Hautement recommandable
data.text:
Sur la route pourr accéder, par le sud, à YOSEMITE National Park ; ce buffet est GENIAL !!! Choix énorme. Cuisines différentes (mexicaine, asiatique, traditionnelle). Qualité des mets et propreté irréprochables. Prix défiant toutes concurrences. L'accueil est super sympa. On paie un prix fixe et on mange autant qu'on veut. Pour deux personnes, tout compris : 25 $ !!! Grand parking. Facile à trouver.
Nous recommandons sans hésitation.
